input_text:
Job Title: Hospital Biller

Location: Annapolis, MD

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Medical Biller

Hybrid Medical Biller for healthcare Accounts Receivable and Collections professionals to continue their professional careers and add additional experience and expertise in the field. As a Medical Biller in this organization, you will have the opportunity to join one of Maryland’s top and most renowned healthcare systems and witness limitless opportunities for career advancement options. Holding interviews as soon as possible for candidates looking to start within the next 2-3 weeks.

 Work Model : Hybrid

 Location : Annapolis, MD

 Pay Rate : $19-23.50/HR *Depending on Experience*

 Schedule : Monday – Friday

 Shifts : 9:00 am – 5:00 pm

 Employee Value 

 Competitive pay rate & 401k, Medical, Dental, Vision insurance Opportunity to work for an established Hospital network that is rapidly growing Flexible Hybrid-based schedule – 3 days onsite and 2 days remotely! Career advancement – opportunity to join an established healthcare system with limitless growth potential


 Job Description 

 Generate revenue by making payment arrangements, collecting accounts, and monitoring and pursuing accounts with pending payments from patients Collect pending accounts by establishing payment arrangements with patients, monitoring payments, and following up with patients when payment lapses occur Prepares and bills patients’ insurance, including interim billing and late charges. Paper claims are to be reviewed for accuracy and billed within two business days Resubmit and/or contact insurance carriers to follow up on previously billed accounts and accurately rebills when appropriate


 Qualifications 

 1-2 Years of previous Medical Billing procedures within any healthcare setting (Hospital, Clinic, Physicians Office, Outpatient Medical Office, etc.) 1-2 Years of Accounts Receivable experience and strong understanding and familiarity working directly with insurance companies Excellent communication skills (written and verbal Time management & Organizational skills, and Customer Service oriented


 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

Paper claims are to be reviewed for accuracy and billed within two business days
Resubmit and/or contact insurance carriers to follow up on previously billed accounts and accurately rebills when appropriate
